goal.en: fundamental concept and applications (especially for photonics) of metamaterials
goal.ch: 超穎材料是近15年非常熱門的研究課題，個人基於實驗室專長，本系有超過3位教師研究主題與超穎材料相關，個人基於實驗室需求開設超穎材料課程，提供相關研究主題研究生超穎材料的基本知識。

content.en:
“1.introduction of metamaterial
2. Excitation of surface plasmon
3. Dispersion relation of surface plasmon
4. Metamaterial based on metallic material
5. Dielectric metamaterial
6. Metasurface
7. Manipulating the EM properties based on metamaterial/metasurface
8. Applications of metamaterial/metasurface: manipulating the amplitude, direction, phase, polarization and frequency of incident EM wave.
8. Nanophotonics device based on metamaterial/metasurface
9. current topics of metamaterial/metasurface“
